Main pronunciation 主要发音: xī

Other pronunciations 其它发音: xī,yí

Original meaning 本义: Meaning bright.

English senses 英语理解: bright, splendid, glorious

Usage example 用法举例: 熙攘 xī rǎng (boisterous)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1889

Shuowen 说文解字: 燥也從火**聲

熈字的基本解释

熈
xī
古同“熙”。

熈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》許其切，平之，曉。］
亦作“焈1”。亦作“煕1”。亦作“熈1”。
(1)光明；明亮。
(2)兴盛；兴起。
(3)和乐；和悦。
(4)晒；照射。
(5)通“嬉”。嬉戏。
(6)通“禧”。吉祥。参见“熙事”。
(7)叹词。
(8)姓。帝喾时有熙氏。见《通志·氏族四》。
[②]［yí］
［《集韻》盈之切，平之，以。］
亦作“煕2”。亦作“熈2”。
用于人名。

熈字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熈； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页679第08
俗熙字。詳熙字註。

熈字的源字形

字形对比：

熈字的起名意思

暂无。

Gu Tong "Hee".
熈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Xu Qiqie, Pingzhi, Xiao. ]
Also known as "焈1". Also known as "Hee 1". Also known as "熈1".
(1) Bright; bright.
(2) Prosperity; rise.
(3) Harmony; Harmony.
(4) Sun; irradiation.
(5) Through "playing". play.
(6) Through "Jubilee". auspicious. See "Xi Shi".
(7) Interjection.
(8) Last name. There was Xi's in the emperor's time. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".
[②]［yí］
["Ji Yun" Ying Zhi cut, flat, to. ]
Also known as "Hee 2". Also known as "熈2".
Used for names.
